QuestData.Title: Unspeakable Atrocities
QuestData.Description: <You unfold the note and begin reading.>$B$BKeeshan, if you're reading this note, I'm dead. Likely that my position was compromised.$B$BOrcs are committing unspeakable atrocities against their prisoners. Yes, prisoners, Keeshan. They've got cages full of P.O.W's. If you're gonna blow up this valley, you'll need to free the prisoners first.$B$BTell my wife I love her and to take out the damned trash.$B$B-Brubaker$B$BPS - They've got black dragons.$B$BTake Brubaker's report back to Keeshan.
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver Brubaker's Report to John J. Keeshan at Camp Everstill in Redridge.
QuestData.RewardText: <Keeshan reads the report.>$B$BDAMN IT! This just got complicated. We've got prisoners of war to rescue before we can blow up the valley. Not to mention the orcs have black dragons on their side.$B$BAre you ready, $n?
